tasks.label: Compile and run
args: Copy-Item -Path "${file}" -Destination "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp"; if ($?) { g++ "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp" -o "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.exe"; if ($?) { Get-Content "${workspaceFolder}\input.txt" | & "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.exe" > "${workspaceFolder}\output.txt"; Remove-Item "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.exe" -Force; Remove-Item "${workspaceFolder}\jspwTest.cpp" -Force } }
